    • Method Detail

      • getSystemService

        public static Object getSystemService(String serviceName)
        Get a system service by name.

        This method is equivalent to App.getInstance().getContext().getSystemService(serviceName). Therefore, App class must be initialized by App.init(Context) before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        serviceName - System service name.
        Returns:
        System service instance.

      • getAccessibilityManager
